name: Newton's Party
description:
Final compile is missing hedge shadows?

It's supposed to look like this:

Click here for a screenshot taken every hour of development!

Introduction:

Play as Newton, who is preparing for his neon party in the Oaklands Maze. You must plug all the lights in!

Controls:

Movement: WASD / Arrow keys (BE GENTLE with the physics engine! )

Interact with environment: Mouse

Mute audio: M

Restart: R

Cheats:

There are extra cables on the far left of the map if you're stuck on the puzzle.

Hold keys: "P" "A" "R" "T" "Y" together to skip the puzzle entirely and go to the party.

Performance issues:

LESS CABLES ON SCREEN = BETTER PERFORMANCE

press SHIFT+1 (for best quality, all segments) 

press SHIFT+5 (for worst quality, very few segments)

The physics simulation is not changed, so wires will look like they're clipping hedges when they're not. But it makes it harder to see when they are.

Misc:

Created in 5 days for the Amaze Me Game jam

Theme: NEON

Development time:  40 hours 5 minutes
